channel.title: f on Merak.run
channel.description: Recent content in f on Merak.run

item.title: FOMO
item.description: F.O.M.O. : Fear Of Missing Out It makes reference to the fear that arises when lots of people buy one crypto currency that is gaining momentum and might drive you into buying something about to fall.

item.title: FTX
item.description: FTX is a recently created exchange with a custom token FTX which has shown very high appreciation. As with other exchanges, it allows to load credit based on different cryptocurrency deposits or traditional banking approaches.
